text: @DrRPNishank @narendramodi @AmitShah @cbseindia29 Sir please postpone the NEET and JEE entrance test for some time , as it's primary responsibility to check the health and life of students . As we all know the COVID-19 cases are increasing day by day , so please sir try to postpone these entrance test .
